headline: Nasdaq Bear Market: Is AMD or Nvidia the Best Buy Now?
summary: Nvidia (NASDAQ: NVDA) and AMD (NASDAQ: AMD) are two of the biggest providers of artificial intelligence (AI) computing hardware, but Nvidia is much larger and more successful than AMD in this regard.  Nvidia's CEO and co-founder, Jensen Huang, invented the GPU in 1999, and AMD also makes GPUs.  This makes them ideal for workloads that need intense computing power, like AI.
